edu.teddys.timer
Class ServerTimer

java.lang.Object
  edu.teddys.timer.ServerTimer

public class ServerTimer
extends java.lang.Object

The ServerTimer does the whole logic of a game with registered players. For example, - process user input - trigger events - check game rules - update all object states (According to https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Source_Multiplayer_Networking )
